      • convertToCsv

        public void convertToCsv(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc,
                         java.lang.String baseUrl,
                         java.lang.String pageTitle,
                         java.lang.String filePath)
                  throws org.jsoup.HttpStatusException
        Converts tables of a given url into a CSV-like file
        Parameters:
        doc - the html representation of that page
        baseUrl - the base url to use to make api calls
        pageTitle - the title of the page
        filePath - the path for the files to be stored in
        Throws:
        org.jsoup.HttpStatusException - if the page does not exist

        public java.lang.StringBuilder processCurrentTDText(java.lang.StringBuilder tdText)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        tdText - the current text of the td (column) to process
        Returns:
        the processed text of that td
